actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Committee on Education and Labor discharged in House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Rereferred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Jobs and Unemployment Assistance Act of 1974 to provide that individuals performing instructional, research, or administrative services for educational institutions will not be eligible for unemployment compensation under such act for periods between academic years or terms.

summary.text: Provides that individuals performing instructional, research, or administrative services for educational institutions shall not be eligible for unemployment compensation under the Emergency Jobs and Unemployment Assistance Act of 1974 for periods between academic years or terms.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Jobs and Unemployment Assistance Act of 1974 to provide that individuals performing instructional, research, or administrative services for educational institutions will not be eligible for unemployment compensation under such act for periods between academic years or terms.
